description.english: Created first upgraded arcanium component. Upgrade basic components to improved versions with upgraded blueprints.
description.spanish: Crea tu primer componente mejorado de Arcanium. Mejora componentes básicos para conseguir versiones mejoradas usando planos de componentes.

description.english: Created first upgraded mako component. Upgrade basic components to improved versions with upgraded blueprints.
description.spanish: Crea tu primer componente mejorado de Mako. Mejora componentes básicos para conseguir versiones mejoradas usando planos de componentes.

description.english: Created first upgraded eter component. Upgrade basic components to improved versions with upgraded blueprints.
description.spanish: Crea tu primer componente mejorado de Éter. Mejora componentes básicos para conseguir versiones mejoradas usando planos de componentes.

displayName.spanish: Crea tu primer componente de esencia avanzada.

description.english: Created first advance essenece component. Use one duality to created an advance component.
description.spanish: Crea tu primer componente de esencia avanzada.

displayName.spanish: Crea tu primer componente de esencia definitiva.

description.english: Created first ultimate essence component. Get an ultimate component blueprint and use one trinity to created an ultimate component.
description.spanish: Crea tu primer componente de esencia definitiva.

description.english: Learn more about essences. You get a new civilitation progress node: Ring Essence Affinity.
description.spanish: Aprende mas sobre las essencias.

description.english: Unlock 3 Components.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 3 componentes.

description.english: Unlock 4 Components.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 4 componentes.

description.english: Unlock 5 Components.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 5 componentes.

description.english: Unlock 6 Components.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 6 componentes.

description.english: Get all ring components to you civilization.
description.spanish: Consigue todos los componentes.

displayName.spanish: El Secreto del Núcleo de Arcanium

description.english: Enter inside the core and get the ultimate blueprint.
description.spanish: Entra en un Núcleo Esencial y consigue un plano definitivo.

displayName.spanish: El Secreto del Núcleo de Mako

description.english: Enter inside the core and get the ultimate blueprint.
description.spanish: Entra en un Núcleo Esencial y consigue un plano definitivo.

description.english: Enter inside the core and get the ultimate blueprint.
description.spanish: Entra en un Núcleo Esencial y consigue un plano definitivo.

displayName.spanish: El Secreto del Núcleo de Esencia Avanzada.

description.english: Enter inside the advance core and get the ultimate blueprint. Arcanium and Mako core.
description.spanish: Entra en un Núcleo Esencial y consigue un plano definitivo.

displayName.spanish: El Secreto del Núcleo de Esencia Avanzada.

description.english: Enter inside the advance core and get the ultimate blueprint. Arcanium and Eter core.
description.spanish: Entra en un Núcleo Esencial y consigue un plano definitivo.

displayName.spanish: El Secreto del Núcleo de Esencia Avanzada.

description.english: Enter inside the advance core and get the ultimate blueprint. Mako and Eter core.
description.spanish: Entra en un Núcleo Esencial y consigue un plano definitivo.

description.english: Build 4 different models of Shield.
description.spanish: Construye 4 mejoras diferentes del Escudo.

description.english: Build 7 different models of B6S cannon.
description.spanish: Construye 7 mejoras diferentes del cañón de B6S.

description.english: Build 7 different models of Matter cannon.
description.spanish: Construye 7 mejoras diferentes del cañón de Materia.

description.english: Build 7 different models of Elision cannon.
description.spanish: Construye 7 mejoras diferentes del cañón Elisión.

description.english: Build 7 different models of Electrium cannon.
description.spanish: Construye 7 mejoras diferentes del cañón Electrium.

description.english: Build 7 different models of Nidel cannon.
description.spanish: Construye 7 mejoras diferentes del cañón Nidel.

description.english: Build 7 different models of Rakt cannon.
description.spanish: Construye 7 mejoras diferentes del cañón Rakt.

description.english: Unlock 8 different techs.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 8 techs diferentes.

description.english: Unlock 16 different techs.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 16 techs diferentes.

description.english: Unlock 24 different techs.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 24 techs diferentes.

description.english: Unlock 32 different techs.
description.spanish: Desbloquea 32 techs diferentes.

description.english: Discover the ledenday tech Fourth Essence.
description.spanish: Descubre la tech legendaria Cuarta-Esencia.

description.english: Discover the ledenday tech Dual Prism T.
description.spanish: Descubre la tech legendaria Prisma Dual T.

description.english: Discover the ledenday tech Dual Prism V.
description.spanish: Descubre la tech legendaria Prisma Dual V.

description.english: Discover the ledenday tech Dual Prism U.
description.spanish: Descubre la tech legendaria Prisma Dual U.

displayName.spanish: Tech Legendaria  Alma del Dios de Arcanium.

description.english: Discover the ledenday tech Arcanium God Soul.
description.spanish: Descubre la tech legendaria  Alma del Dios de Arcanium.

displayName.spanish: Tech Legendaria  Alma del Dios de Mako.

description.english: Discover the ledenday tech Mako God Soul.
description.spanish: Descubre la tech legendaria  Alma del Dios de Mako.

displayName.spanish: Tech Legendaria  Alma del Dios de Eter.

description.english: Discover the ledenday tech Eter God Soul.
description.spanish: Descubre la tech legendaria Alma del Dios de Eter.

description.english: Discover the ledenday tech Cronos Heart.
description.spanish: Descubre la tech legendaria Corazón de Cronos.

description.english: Discover the ledenday tech Kairos Skin.
description.spanish: Descubre la tech legendaria Tejido de Kairos.

description.english: Find a way to destroy a collector on your planet to make room for a new one.
description.spanish: Encuentra la manera de destruir una colectora de tu planeta para dejar sitio a otra.

description.english: Level up all the collectors available on your planet to the maximum level.
description.spanish: Maximiza el nivel de las colectoras de tu planeta.

displayName.spanish: Consigue todas las colectoras en una partida.

description.english: Build all possible collectors on your planet. in a run.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las colectoras en una partida.

description.english: The journey begins. Get a gravity engine and build tha planetary ship that allows us to escape with our entire civilization.
description.spanish: Comienza el viaje. Consigue un motor gravitacional y contruye una nave planetaria. Gracias a esto podemos contruir una nave planetaria que nos permite escapar con todo nuestro sistema.

description.english: The journey continue. You now have the knowledge to create a galactic jump engine. However you need Ancestral Essence to make it work.
description.spanish: El viaje continúa. Ahora tienes el conocimiento para crear un motor de salto galáctico. Sin embargo, necesitas Esencia Ancestral para hacerlo funcionar.

displayName.spanish: Progreso de Civilización: Sistema de Navegacion.

description.english: Buy GPS in a wander shop.
description.spanish: Compra el sistema de cosmolocalización (GPS).

displayName.spanish: Progreso de Civilización: Sistema de Viraje.

description.english: Fraguas offers you his help. He leaves you with ancestral knowledge that's key to your progress.
description.spanish: Fraguas te ofrece su ayuda. Te deja conocimiento ancestral clave para tu progreso.

displayName.spanish: Progreso de Civilización: Sistema de Impulsos

description.english: You were in a dangerous area and found something special.
description.spanish: En un sitio peligroso algo especial esperaba

description.english: You have discovered how to use your ring to link coordinates and be able to travel through portals instantly. It takes time between uses but performance can be improved by upgrading the portals node.
description.spanish: Has descubierto cómo usar tu anillo para enlazar coordenadas y poder viajar a través de portales al instante

displayName.spanish: Progreso de Civilización: Hangar de Componentes.

description.english: You find something lost.
description.spanish: Algo perdido.

description.english: Thanks to Forgotten Alchemist you have discovered advanced essences.
description.spanish: Gracias al Alquimista Olvidado has descubierto esencias avanzadas.

description.english: Obtain a part of the coordinate given to you by the wander merchant Arcistotele.
description.spanish: Obtain a part of the coordinate given to you by the wander merchant Arcistotele.

description.english: Obtain a part of the coordinate given to you by the wander merchant Makiavela.
description.spanish: Obtén una parte de las coordenadas que te dio el comerciante errante Makiavela.

description.english: Obtain a part of the coordinate given to you by the wander merchant Eticuro.
description.spanish: Obtén una parte de las coordenadas que te dio el comerciante errante Eticuro.

description.english: You buy enought items. It seems you've established a strong bond with the merchants.
description.spanish: Invertiste suficiente en las tiendas errantes. Parece que has forjado un fuerte vínculo con los comerciantes.

description.english: Fraguas needs your help. Bring him a Nanoboost and find out what he wants it for.
description.spanish: Fraguas necesita tu ayuda! Llevale una Nanopropulsor y descubre para que lo necesita.

description.english: Get first Simple Node.
description.spanish: Primer Nodo Simple.

description.english: Get first Advance Node.
description.spanish: Primer Nodo Avanzado.

description.english: Get first Duality.
description.spanish: Primera Dualidad.

description.english: Get first Trinity.
description.spanish: Primera Trinidad.

description.english: Die once. Death is not the end.
description.spanish: Muere por primera vez. Para los nautas, la muerte no es el final.

description.english: You've managed to survive as long as possible until the system collapsed. Don't worry, maybe next time you'll make it out in time.
description.spanish: Has logrado sobrevivir el mayor tiempo posible hasta que el sistema colapsó. No te preocupes, quizás la próxima vez logres escapar a tiempo.

description.english: You've survived until the arrival of the void. However, you've succumbed to it. It seems you found something.
description.spanish: Has sobrevivido hasta la llegada del vacío. Sin embargo, has sucumbido a él.

description.english: You have escaped and survive, you have become stronger, but the void will follow you wherever you go.
description.spanish: Has escapado y sobrevivido, te has vuelto más fuerte, pero el vacío te seguirá dondequiera que vayas.

description.english: Survive 5 minutes.
description.spanish: Sobrevive 5 minutos.

description.english: Survive 10 minutes.
description.spanish: Sobrevive 10 minutos.

description.english: Survive 15 minutes.
description.spanish: Sobrevive 15 minutos.

description.english: Survive 20 minutes.
description.spanish: Sobrevive 20 minutos.

description.english: Survive 25 minutes.
description.spanish: Sobrevive 25 minutos.

description.english: Survive 30 minutes.
description.spanish: Sobrevive 30 minutos.

description.english: Survive 40 minutes.
description.spanish: Sobrevive 40 minutos.

description.english: Successfully escape in a game in 20 min or less.
description.spanish: Escapa con éxito en una partida en 20 minutos o menos.

description.spanish: Escapa con éxito en una partida con nivel de amenaza 1.

description.english: Defeat Elite Shooter.
description.spanish: Derrota al Tirador de Élite.

description.spanish: Derrota Bola de Demolición Elite.
